Container.Name: Mailpile
Container.Overview: Mailpile is software, an e-mail client. The goal of Mailpile is to allow people to send e-mail in a more secure and private manner than before.
Container.Description: Mailpile is an effort to reclaim private communication on the Internet. A project to rescue our personal lives from the proprietary cloud and prevent our conversations from being strip-mined for corporate profit and government surveillance. Mailpile is taking e-mail back. [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br]
